ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'O self at rest and at peace,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (On the other hand it will be said): “O serene soul!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O soul that art at rest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But ah! thou soul at peace!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [But to the righteous, God will say], "O soul at peace,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (To the righteous soul will be said:) "O (thou) soul, in (complete) rest and satisfaction!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said to the pious): "O (you) the one in (complete) rest and satisfaction!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But as for you, O tranquil soul.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:27] ‘O soul at peace!, [the one] secure, namely, the believing one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But ah! thou soul at peace) which is safe from Allah's chastisement, true in its profession of Allah's divine Oneness, grateful for the blessings Allah bestowed upon it, patient with the trials of Allah, pleased with things decreed by Allah, and content with that which Allah gives!
